flavorText: "You see that sheen on the fur? The glint in their eyes? Top quality. These are the real deal."
name: Squirrel Dealer
originalText: When Squirrel Dealer enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game "Do you like Squirrels?" If he or she does, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.

rulings.text: It doesn’t have to be someone who plays Magic. This may be fun.
If there’s no one around to make a decision, you can call or text someone if you need to. If there’s a physical action required, such as high-fiving, you’ll need someone there.
You can choose any player not currently in your game. This includes people who used to be in your game but left it.

text: When Squirrel Dealer enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game "Do you like Squirrels?" If they do, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token.
